item.title: Cheat Sheet / Summary
item.description: Back to Home my notes have references to .NET Core so this might not actually be helpful Based TraversyMedia’s Laravel Crash Course | Uploaded: Apr. 26, 2022: [link] Installation for Windows Software you need… something to run Linux commands, so install GitBash (the documentation tells you to get Docker but don’t mind that) Composer to run the following in a terminal (assuming you’re going to use Laravel for quite a while and it’s not just a one time thing): composer global require laravel/installer.
